Asthma and Respiratory Foundation supports ban on engineered stone benchtops to protect tradies from silicosis lung disease https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/asthma-and-respiratory-foundation-supports-ban-on-engineered-stone-benchtops-to-protect-tradies-from-silicosis-lung-disease/RT7FDVY7JBEMVGLAQEBAFCEWDU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/asthma-and-respiratory-foundation-supports-ban-on-engineered-stone-benchtops-to-protect-tradies-from-silicosis-lung-disease/RT7FDVY7JBEMVGLAQEBAFCEWDU/ Nicholas JonesPressure is growing on the Government to act, after Australia decided to ban the stone. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 00:32:05 +0000 Engineered or artificial stone is the most popular benchtop material in new kitchens and bathrooms, but will be banned in Australia from July. Photo / 123rf.com
